modules.description: This module defines configuration parameters for TLS connections, specifically providing a key for client-side TLS configuration. It works with `Tls.Config.client` options and integrates with connection setup to enable secure communication. Concrete use cases include configuring certificate validation and setting up secure database connections over TLS.

This module provides TLS configuration capabilities for securing client connections, centering around the setup and management of TLS parameters. It includes data types representing TLS configurations and operations for enabling secure communication channels, particularly useful during connection initialization. Users can configure certificate validation policies, specify client certificates, and integrate these settings into database or network connections requiring TLS. Example usage includes setting up a secure PostgreSQL connection with custom certificate authorities or enforcing client-side TLS in a networked application.
